page.title: 02Weeton/Preese Civil Parish
page.content:
The civil parish has a {population}of almost 500 and 235 {electors.}There are five{council {members,}a professional engineer, a bank manager, a farmer, a retired farmer and a self-employed decorator. { {Turn-out}in elections is 30-40% {Public attendance}at council meetings is very small; but there are usually 30-40 at the parish meeting in March.
The council has accepted responsibility for the maintenance of open spaces and bus shelters. It is organising the construction of a children's playground. It would like to see a part-time doctor's surgery established in the village and hopes to provide an additional bus to take villagers into the nearby towns for shopping expeditions.
